response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, reflecting countless hours of dedication and innovation. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I believe it's worth more than just monetary value; it's an investment in excellence. I am offering you this remarkable product for $15,000. This price encapsulates not only the cost of production but also the intangible benefits it promises to bring into your life. I trust that once you experience its capabilities and benefits, you'll see the true worth of this offering. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 15000}
